content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: UpdateNetwork path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/ipam/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/networks/{network_id} content: params
name stackid
in path
required true
desc a stack id or slug
schema
type str
name networkid
in path
required true
desc a vpc network id or slug
schema
type str
sum update a vpc network
desc only a networks name may be updated
reqbody
networkupdatenetworkrequest
type obj
props
name
type str
desc the networks new name
networkmetadata
type obj
props

type str
desc a string to string key/value pair
createdat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that a metadata entry was created
nullable true

format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that a metadata entry was last updated
nullable true
deleterequestedat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that an entity was requested for deletion
nullable true
version
type str
desc an entitys version number

versions start at 1 when they are created and increment by 1 every time they are updated
desc metadata associated with an entity
required true

rootsubnet

desc a subnet identifier and network mask in cidr notation format

a networks root subnet is its primary subnet
virtualnetworkidentifier
type integer
format int32
desc a networks vlan identifier
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack that a network belongs to
desc a network defined within a virtual private cloud
desc a response from a request to update a network
